content.question: A delivery drone of mass <math alttext="M sub d" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>M</mi><mtext>d</mtext></msub></math> carries a physics textbook of mass <math alttext="M sub t b" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>M</mi><mtext>tb</mtext></msub></math>. At the instant shown, the drone has an upward acceleration. The normal force exerted on the textbook is <math alttext="F sub N" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>F</mi><mi>N</mi></msub></math>. Which of the following is a correct expression for the magnitude of the acceleration of the drone?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction F sub N, over M sub t b, end fraction, minus g" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><msub><mi>F</mi><mi>N</mi></msub><msub><mi>M</mi><mtext>tb</mtext></msub></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mi>g</mi></math>

<math alttext="the fraction F sub N, over M sub d, end fraction, minus the fraction M sub t b, over M sub d, end fraction, times g" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><msub><mi>F</mi><mi>N</mi></msub><msub><mi>M</mi><mtext>d</mtext></msub></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mfrac><msub><mi>M</mi><mtext>tb</mtext></msub><msub><mi>M</mi><mtext>d</mtext></msub></mfrac><mi>g</mi></math>
<math alttext="the fraction F sub N, over M sub t b, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><msub><mi>F</mi><mi>N</mi></msub><msub><mi>M</mi><mtext>tb</mtext></msub></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="the fraction M sub t b, over M sub d, end fraction, times g, minus, the fraction F sub N, over M sub d, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><msub><mi>M</mi><mtext>tb</mtext></msub><msub><mi>M</mi><mtext>d</mtext></msub></mfrac><mi>g</mi><mo>−</mo><mfrac><msub><mi>F</mi><mi>N</mi></msub><msub><mi>M</mi><mtext>d</mtext></msub></mfrac></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction F sub N, over M sub t b, end fraction, minus g" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><msub><mi>F</mi><mi>N</mi></msub><msub><mi>M</mi><mtext>tb</mtext></msub></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mi>g</mi></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
